flyer1.Explanation: Ua hauʻoli ʻo {{1}} i ka hoʻolaha ʻana i ka hoʻomaka ʻana o kā mākou pūnaewele hou. Aia ka papa inoa o nā hiʻohiʻona e ulu nei, e like me:
flyer1.Public: ʻIke lehulehu e pili ana iā {{1}}
flyer1.Private: He moʻokāki hoʻohana pilikino no kēlā me kēia lālā
flyer1.Notifications: Ma ke komo ʻana i kāu leka uila a i ʻole helu kelepona hiki iā ʻoe ke loaʻa i nā leka koʻikoʻi ma o ka leka uila a i ʻole ka leka uila.
flyer1.GetStarted: No ka hoʻomaka ʻana, ma kāu polokalamu kele pūnaewele e ʻoluʻolu e hoʻokomo:
flyer1.IssuedToYou: Hāʻawi ʻia kēia code iā ʻoe.
